sentences: Mul on see teada meie mõtlemiseks ja meeldejätmiseks.
Meil peaks meelde tulema kuidas meie eesmärke saavutada.
context: The word 'meelde' is commonly used in Estonian to indicate something being kept in one's mind or remembered. It often appears with verbs like 'jääma' (to stay) or 'tulema' (to come) to form expressions related to remembering.
